nodes.name: redeem
redeemFromCRExt
redeem
redeemFromCRExt

redeem(address,address,bytes32,address,a.details: helper to redeem rewards for a proposal It calls execute on the proposal if it is not yet executed. It tries to redeem reputation and stake from the GenesisProtocol. It tries to redeem proposal rewards from the contribution rewards scheme. This function does not emit events. A client should listen to GenesisProtocol and ContributionReward redemption events to monitor redemption operations.

params._proposalId: the ID of the voting in the voting machine

redeem(address,address,bytes32,address,a.return: gpRewards array         gpRewards[0] - stakerTokenAmount         gpRewards[1] - voterReputationAmount         gpRewards[2] - proposerReputationAmountgpDaoBountyReward array        gpDaoBountyReward[0] - staker dao bounty reward -                               will be zero for the case there is not enough tokens in avatar for the reward.        gpDaoBountyReward[1] - staker potential dao bounty reward.executed  bool true or falsewinningVote                  1 - executed or closed and the winning vote is YES                  2 - executed or closed and the winning vote is NOint256 crReputationReward Reputation - from ContributionRewardint256 crNativeTokenReward NativeTokenReward - from ContributionRewardint256 crEthReward Ether - from ContributionRewardint256 crExternalTokenReward ExternalToken - from ContributionReward

redeemFromCRExt(address,address,bytes32,.details: helper to redeem rewards for a proposal It calls execute on the proposal if it is not yet executed. It tries to redeem reputation and stake from the GenesisProtocol. It tries to redeem proposal rewards from the contribution rewards scheme. This function does not emit events. A client should listen to GenesisProtocol and ContributionReward redemption events to monitor redemption operations.

params._proposalId: the ID of the voting in the voting machine

redeemFromCRExt(address,address,bytes32,.return: gpRewards array         gpRewards[0] - stakerTokenAmount         gpRewards[1] - voterReputationAmount         gpRewards[2] - proposerReputationAmountgpDaoBountyReward array        gpDaoBountyReward[0] - staker dao bounty reward -                               will be zero for the case there is not enough tokens in avatar for the reward.        gpDaoBountyReward[1] - staker potential dao bounty reward.executed  bool true or falsewinningVote                  1 - executed or closed and the winning vote is YES                  2 - executed or closed and the winning vote is NOint256 crReputationReward Reputation - from ContributionRewardint256 crNativeTokenReward NativeTokenReward - from ContributionRewardint256 crEthReward Ether - from ContributionRewardint256 crExternalTokenReward ExternalToken - from ContributionReward
